description:
Meet the new doppelganger.来见见新的二重身！

The Vampire Diaries made its fifth appearance at Comic-Con on Saturday and once again brought along quite the teasing preview for their upcoming season, which we're already predicting will be owned by Paul Wesley, whose character Stefan was revealed to be Silas' doppelganger in the season four finale's last scene.美国时间上周六，吸血鬼日记剧组第五次出席了圣迭戈动漫展，他们所带来的下季预告也一如既往的糊弄人（前面是SDE三角恋大回顾，只有最后几十秒是预告……）。我们已经预测到保罗·韦斯利将是预告的主角，因为第四季的最后一幕揭示了斯特凡是塞拉斯的二重身。

In the season five sneak peek that was shown during the panel, Wesley chews some major scenery as season five's big bad, Silas, who decides to test out just how strong he is by attempting to compel an entire town.在发布会上公布的这段第五季场景前瞻中，主要展现了韦斯利所扮演的大恶魔塞拉斯试图控制全镇人民，来试验自己到底有多强大。

But it seems like Silas' reign as the show's big bad may be short-lived after Julie Plec hinted someone worse could be on the horizon.但是塞拉斯的统治似乎不会持续很久，因为吸血鬼日记编剧朱莉·普莱柯暗示还将有更坏的坏蛋出现。

As for romance scoop, Delena fans were happy to hear that Julie Plec and the writers plan to keep the fan favorite couple together and happy...at least for the time being.至于恋爱关系方面，对于DE粉们是个好消息，朱莉·普莱柯和其他编剧们打算让粉丝们最爱的这对快乐地在一起……至少暂时如此。

Of course, fans were curious to know about Klaus (Joseph Morgan) and Caroline's (Candice Accola) romantic future now that Morgan is set to headline the spinoff The Originals. Could fans see Klaus make a return to Mystic Falls? "Never say never, I would say. He's going to have his hands full in New Orleans," Plec said. "The question is whether Caroline will have her hands full with Klaus in New Orleans."当然，粉丝们也很想知道克劳斯和卡罗琳是否有未来，虽然克劳斯的扮演者约瑟夫·摩根已经去衍生剧《始祖家族》担任主角了。我们还能看到克劳斯回到神秘瀑布镇吗？“我只能说：永不说不。克劳斯在新奥尔良有一堆事要忙呢，”普莱柯说，“关键问题是卡罗琳是否会去到新奥尔良同克劳斯一起忙活。”
